closed_cohort_metadata.help: Whether the model should run as closed_cohort, open-population by default

p_female_metadata.help: Proportion of females in the population

height_0_betas_metadata.help: Regression coefficients for estimating height (in meters) at baseline

height_0_sd_metadata.help: SD representing heterogeneity in baseline height

weight_0_betas_metadata.help: Regression coefficients for estimating weight (in Kg) at baseline

weight_0_sd_metadata.help: SD representing heterogeneity in baseline weight

height_weight_rho_metadata.help: Correlation coefficient between weight and height at baseline

p_incidence_age_metadata.help: Discrete distribution of age for the incidence population (population arriving after the first date) - generally estimated through calibration

l_inc_betas_metadata.help: Ln of incidence rate of the new population - Calibration target to keep populatoin size and age pyramid in line with calibration
l_inc_betas_metadata.ref: If closed cohort is enabled, incidence population will be turned off.

ln_h_bgd_betas_metadata.help: Increased Longevity Over time and effect of other variables

logit_p_current_smoker_0_betas_metadata.help: Probability of being a current smoker at the time of creation

logit_p_never_smoker_con_not_current_0_b.help: Probability of being a never-smoker conditional on not being current smoker, at the time of creation

mortality_factor_current_metadata.help: Mortality ratio for current smokers vs. non-smokers by sex and age group

mortality_factor_former_metadata.help: Mortality ratio for former smokers vs. non-smokers by sex and age group

pack_years_0_betas_metadata.help: Regression equations for determining the pack-years of smoking at the time of creation (for smokers)

pack_years_0_sd_metadata.help: Standard deviation for variation in pack-years among individuals (current or former smokers)

ln_h_inc_betas_metadata.help: Log-hazard of starting smoking (incidence or relapse)

ln_h_ces_betas_metadata.ref: Diagnosis coefficient from Wu et al. BMC Public Health 2006

smoking_ces_coefficient_metadata.help: Coefficient for the decay rate of smoking cessaton treatment, default is 100

smoking_cessation_adherence_metadata.help: Proportion adherent to smoking cessation treatment

logit_p_COPD_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Logit of the probability of having COPD (FEV1/FVC<0.7) at time of creation (separately by sex)
logit_p_COPD_betas_by_sex_metadata.ref: CanCold - Shahzad's Derivation. Last Updated on 2017-09-19, ne wmodel with no currnet smoker term

ln_h_COPD_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Log-hazard of developing COPD (FEV1/FVC<LLN) for those who did not have COPD at creation time (separately by sex)
ln_h_COPD_betas_by_sex_metadata.ref: Amin's Iterative solution. Last Updated on 2022-06-33 (0.29.0)

fev1_0_prev_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Regression (OLS) coefficients for mean of FEV1 at time of creation for those with COPD (separately by sex)
fev1_0_prev_betas_by_sex_metadata.ref: for LLN based on Shahzad's calculations. Last Updated on 2017-04-19. See https://github.com/aminadibi/epicR/issues/8

fev1_0_prev_sd_by_sex_metadata.help: SD of FEV1 at time of creation for those with COPD (separately by sex)

fev1_0_inc_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Regression (OLS) coefficients for mean of FEV1 at time of development of COPD(separately by sex)
fev1_0_inc_betas_by_sex_metadata.ref: for LLN based on Shahzad's calculations. Last Updated on 2017-04-19. See https://github.com/aminadibi/epicR/issues/8

fev1_0_inc_sd_by_sex_metadata.help: SD of FEV1 at time of development of COPD (separately by sex)

fev1_0_ZafarCMAJ_by_sex_metadata.help: Regression coefficients for mean of FEV1 at time of creation with COPD or development of COPD based on Zafar's CMAJ. Used for conditional normal distribution in FEV1 decline equations.  (separately by sex)
fev1_0_ZafarCMAJ_by_sex_metadata.ref: Zafari Z, Sin DD, Postma DS, Lofdahl CG, Vonk J, Bryan S, Lam S, Tammemagi CM, Khakban R, Man SP, Tashkin D. Individualized prediction of lung-function decline in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. Canadian Medical Association Journal. 2016 Oct 4;188(14):1004-11.

pred_fev1_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Coefficients for calculation of predicted FEV1 based on individual characteristics

fev1_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Regression equations (mixed-effects model) for rate of FEV1 decline

dfev1_sigmas_metadata.help: Sigmas in G Matrix for FEV1 decline

dfev1_re_rho_metadata.help: Correlation coefficient between random-effect terms in the mixed-effects model of FEV1 decline

ln_rate_betas_metadata.help: Regression coefficients for the random-effects log-hazard model of exacerbation (of any severity)
ln_rate_betas_metadata.ref: Rates from DOI: 10.2147/COPD.S13826, adjusted to account for diganosis bias. Adjusted on 2018-10-02 to match manuscript. Recalibrated on 2022-11-04, see validate_exacerbations()

ln_rate_intercept_sd_metadata.help: SD of the random intercept for log-hazard of exacerbation

logit_severity_betas_metadata.help: Regression coefficients for the proportional odds model of exacerbation severity
logit_severity_betas_metadata.ref: Shahzad's regression on MACRO with adjusted intercepts to match severity levels reported by Hoogendoorn et al. Last updated on manuscript submission

logit_severity_intercept_sd_metadata.help: SD of the random intercept for proportional odds model of exacerbation severity

rate_severity_intercept_rho_metadata.help: Correlation coefficient between the random effect terms of rate and severity

exac_end_rate_metadata.help: Rate of ending of an exacerbation (inversely realted to exacerbation duration) according to severity level

logit_p_death_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of death due to exacerbation according to its severity level

logit_p_cough_COPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having cough for COPD patients
logit_p_cough_COPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_cough_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having cough for non-COPD patients
logit_p_cough_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_phlegm_COPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having phlegm for COPD patients
logit_p_phlegm_COPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_phlegm_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having phlegm for non-COPD patients
logit_p_phlegm_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_dyspnea_COPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having dyspnea for COPD patients
logit_p_dyspnea_COPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_dyspnea_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having dyspnea for non-COPD patients
logit_p_dyspnea_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_wheeze_COPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having wheeze for COPD patients
logit_p_wheeze_COPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

logit_p_wheeze_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of having wheeze for non-COPD patients
logit_p_wheeze_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

covariance_COPD_metadata.help: Covariance matrix for symptoms random effects in COPD patients
covariance_COPD_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

covariance_nonCOPD_metadata.help: Covariance matrix for symptoms random effects in non-COPD patients
covariance_nonCOPD_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-22

ln_rate_gpvisits_COPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Rate of GP visits for COPD patients
ln_rate_gpvisits_COPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-29

dispersion_gpvisits_COPD_metadata.help: Dispersion parameter for GP visits model in COPD patients

ln_rate_gpvisits_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.help: Rate of GP visits for Non-COPD patients
ln_rate_gpvisits_nonCOPD_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-29

dispersion_gpvisits_nonCOPD_metadata.help: Dispersion parameter for GP visits model in non-COPD patients

p_case_detection_metadata.help: Probability of recieving case detection in each year given they meet the selection criteria
p_case_detection_metadata.ref: Only applies if case_detection_start_year less than time_horizon.

case_detection_start_end_yrs_metadata.help: Years in which case detection programme is to begin and end, respectively.
case_detection_start_end_yrs_metadata.ref: Acts as on on/off switch for case detection. Default is 100 i.e. case detection is off. To apply case detection, start year must be less than the time horizon. If case detection is to be administered for entire time horizon then start year would be zero and end year >= time horizon.

years_btw_case_detection_metadata.help: Number of years between case detection

min_cd_age_metadata.help: Minimum age for recieving case detection

min_cd_pack_years_metadata.help: Minimum pack-years smoking to recieve case detection

min_cd_symptoms_metadata.help: Set to 1 if only patients with symptoms should recieve case detection at baseline

case_detection_methods_metadata.help: Sensitivity, specificity, and cost of case detection methods in the total population

case_detection_methods_eversmokers_metad.help: Sensitivity, specificity, and cost of case detection methods among ever smokers

case_detection_methods_symptomatic_metad.help: Sensitivity, specificity, and cost of case detection methods among ever smokers

logit_p_prevalent_diagnosis_by_sex_metad.help: Probability of being diagnosed for patients with prevalent COPD
logit_p_prevalent_diagnosis_by_sex_metad.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-08-09

logit_p_diagnosis_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of being diagnosed for COPD patients
logit_p_diagnosis_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-05-29

logit_p_overdiagnosis_by_sex_metadata.help: Probability of being overdiagnosed for non-COPD subjects
logit_p_overdiagnosis_by_sex_metadata.ref: Kate's regression on CanCOLD, provided on 2019-07-16

medication_ln_hr_exac_metadata.help: Rate reduction in exacerbations due to treatment
medication_ln_hr_exac_metadata.ref: ICS/LABA: Annual Rate Ratio of Comibation Therapy (Salmeterol and Fluticasone Propionate) vs. Placebo from TORCH (doi: 10.1056/NEJMoa063070), ICS: Annual Rate Ratio between Fluticasone vs. Placebo from TRISTAN Trial (doi:10.1016/S0140-6736(03)12459-2), LABA: Annual Rate Ratio between Salmeterol vs. Placebo from TRISTAN Trial (doi:10.1016/S0140-6736(03)12459-2), LAMA-Zhou et al. 2017, LAMA/LABA-UPLIFT 2008, ICS/LAMA/LABA-KRONOS 2018

logit_p_mi_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Logit probability of myocardial infarction by sex

ln_h_mi_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Log-hazard of myocardial infarction by sex

p_mi_death_metadata.help: Probability of death from myocardial infarction

logit_p_stroke_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Logit probability of stroke by sex

logit_p_hf_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Logit probability of heart failure by sex

ln_h_hf_betas_by_sex_metadata.help: Log-hazard of heart failure by sex

bg_cost_by_stage_metadata.help: Annual direct (NON-TREATMENT) maintenance costs for non-COPD and COPD by GOLD grades

exac_dcost_metadata.help: Incremental direct costs of exacerbations by severity levels

cost_smoking_cessation_metadata.help: Cost of 12 weeks Nicotine Replacement Therapy from Mullen BMJ Tobacco Control 2014

bg_util_by_stage_metadata.help: Background utilities for non-COPD, and COPD by GOLD grades

exac_dutil_metadata.help: Incremental change in utility during exacerbations by severity level

explicit_mortality_by_age_sex_metadata.help: Explicit mortality rates by age and sex
